mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, c.id c_id, c.use_type c_use_type, c.name c_name, c.amount c_amount, c.min_point c_min_point, c.platform c_platform, c.type c_type, c.note c_note, c.start_time c_start_time, c.end_time c_end_time, cpr.id pro_id, cpr.product_id pro_product_id, cpcr.id cate_id, cpcr.product_category_id cate_product_category_id, FROM sms_coupon_history ch LEFT JOIN sms_coupon c ON c.id = ch.coupon_id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cpcr ON cpcr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cpr ON cpr.coupon_id = c.id WHERE ch.member_id = #{memberId} AND ch.use_status = 0
